actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to permit aid to families with dependent children to be paid with respect to a needy child whose father is receiving unemployment compensation or whose father is employed but whose earnings (plus other family income) are inadequate to provide family support.

summary.text: Permits aid to families with dependent children to be paid, under title IV of the Social Security Act, with respect to a needy child whose father is receiving unemployment compensation but whose earnings (plus other family income) are inadequate to provide family support.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to permit aid to families with dependent children to be paid with respect to a needy child whose father is receiving unemployment compensation or whose father is employed but whose earnings (plus other family income) are inadequate to provide family support.
